metadata.title: Identity Secret Backend: Identity Tokens - HTTP API
metadata.description: This is the API documentation for configuring, acquiring, and validating vault issued identity tokens.

outlineItems.title: Read configurations for the identity tokens backend
Read the OpenID configuration from an identity token issuer
Read identity token issuer's public JWKS
Read plugin identity token issuer's OpenID configuration
Read the public JWKS from a plugin identity token issuer

metadata.title: Vault by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing. Vault handles leasing, key revocation, key rolling, auditing, and provides secrets as a service through a unified API.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

packageManagers.label: Ubuntu/Debian
commands: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install vault

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Vault Integrations.
